definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: The smoke grew thicker and I could see flames all around.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧越來越濃，四處火舌沖天。

sentences.english: This article introduces the development of cupola melting technology at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了國內外沖天爐熔鍊控制技術的發展狀況。

sentences.english: Cupola is the most inportant melting equipment for production cast iron up to now.
sentences.chinese: 沖天爐至今仍是鑄鐵生產最主要的熔鍊設備。

sentences.english: QiLe know QiRen looking for Fanny after pretending to be a mother, angry.
sentences.chinese: 祁樂知道祁仁找芬妮假扮母親後，怒氣沖天。

sentences.english: Students are cleaning in campus, they are making the dust fly.
sentences.chinese: 學生們正在清掃校園，他們真是幹勁沖天啊。

sentences.english: The progress of cupola and induction furnace melting techniques of cast iron in Japan was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了日本沖天爐，感應電爐的鑄鐵熔鍊技術進展。

sentences.english: The shells consist of cardboard tubes filled with gunpowder and 'stars'.
sentences.chinese: 沖天炮由填充着火藥和“星星”的紙筒做成。

sentences.english: He hurled the umbrella wrathfully into an excavation.
sentences.chinese: 他怒氣沖天地把綢傘猛地擲進一個坑裏。

sentences.english: Copula net diagram is an important tool for guiding the cupola operation.
sentences.chinese: 網形圖是指導沖天爐熔鍊操作的重要工具。

sentences.english: Flaming in a short time, this is I most like to see.
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒火光沖天，這是我最喜歡看見的情景。

sentences.english: The fundamental key points of the debugging and using with the water-cooled cupola have been illustrated too.
sentences.chinese: 並且說明了水冷沖天爐調試和使用的基本要點。

sentences.english: Die Tempelwächter-Kampfkunst Flammenwerfer ist jetzt stärker. The temple guard flamethrower-martial is now stronger.
sentences.chinese: 神廟守衛的戰技“怒火沖天”現在更強了。

sentences.english: Spirit is like the seabird perching on the verge of the cliff, waiting for the moment to fly skywards.
sentences.chinese: 精神如棲身於懸崖邊的海鳥，在等候沖天而飛的時刻。

sentences.english: The cupola-induction furnace duplex melting process can be used to increase the inoculation effect.
sentences.chinese: 採用沖天爐感應爐雙聯熔鍊能提高孕育效果。

sentences.english: The bar mirrors this cubic cupola below, with seating on three sides.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧鏡子這立方米以下的沖天爐，三面的座位。

sentences.english: Motorbikes were set on fire, sending bursts of bright flame skyward .
sentences.chinese: 摩托車被點燃，耀眼的火焰沖天而起。

definition: spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
